description:
Kamitsuki Nori is being transferred to a high school in Gunma.  While riding the train, he remembers his friend Todoroki moved there in elementary school.  Todoroki, warns Kamitsuki to stay away.  As the train gets closer to Gunma, Kamitsuki realizes the doors have stopped opening automatically...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 心にググッとグンマ県
